headline: NRG Energy (NRG): Assessing Valuation After Recent Pullback in Share Price
summary: NRG Energy (NRG) has caught the eye of many investors lately as its shares have moved down roughly 4% over the past month, raising questions about the reasons behind this decline. Nothing headline-grabbing has hit the news in the past few days, but sometimes quieter pullbacks deserve a closer look. Are we spotting an early signal, or just seeing some routine market churn? With NRG's latest close at $148.19 and no major event driving the shift, this moment is prompting some investors to pause...

headline: Aalo Atomics secures $100m to advance modular nuclear tech
summary: Aalo Atomics, a Texas, US-based company specialising in modular nuclear technology to power AI data centres, has raised $100m in Series B funding. The funding was led by Valor Equity Partners, with participation from new and existing investors including Fine Structure Ventures, Hitachi Ventures and NRG Energy. This brings Aalo’s total funding to more than…
